params.name: token_ids_0
params.description: List of ids of the first sequence.

params.name: token_ids_1
params.description: List of ids of the second sequence.

params.name: already_has_special_tokens
params.description: Whether or not the token list is alreadyformatted with special tokens for the model. Defaults to None.

return.description: The list of integers in the range [0, 1]:1 for a special token, 0 for a sequence token.1 for a special token, 0 for a sequence token.
